Civil

PT. Caterpillar Indonesia

Epoxy Painting

2 photos - Click to view

Project Overview

PT Toolmate Technologies Indonesia executed a large-scale industrial epoxy flooring project for PT. Caterpillar Indonesia's manufacturing facility. The project demanded high-performance flooring solutions capable of withstanding heavy machinery operations and chemical exposure.

Scope of Work

  • Surface preparation and concrete repair
  • Industrial-grade epoxy primer application
  • Multi-layer epoxy coating system
  • Anti-slip finish for safety compliance
  • Line marking for traffic and safety zones

Project Details

Client

PT. Caterpillar Indonesia

Location

Batam, Indonesia

Category

Civil
